name: Tokyo
summary: Tokyo blends high-tech innovation with deep-rooted traditions. Visitors can enjoy sushi, ramen, and vibrant street food while exploring temples and neon-lit districts like Shibuya.

name: Paris
summary: The city of light, fashion, and romance. Enjoy croissants and fine wine by the Eiffel Tower, explore the Louvre, and stroll through art-filled Montmartre streets.

name: New York
summary: The city that never sleeps â€” from Times Square to Central Park. Discover art at MoMA, Broadway shows, and iconic New York pizza and bagels.

name: Kyoto
summary: A peaceful city filled with ancient temples, tea houses, and cherry blossoms. Known for matcha desserts, kaiseki cuisine, and traditional culture around Gion district.

name: Sydney
summary: A sunny harbor city where modern life meets ocean breeze. Surf at Bondi Beach, see the Sydney Opera House, and enjoy local seafood under blue skies.

name: Cairo
summary: Home of the Great Pyramids and the Nile. Explore ancient architecture, colorful bazaars, and try traditional dishes like koshari and falafel.

name: Rio de Janeiro
summary: Vibrant energy, samba music, and breathtaking landscapes. Visit Copacabana Beach, Christ the Redeemer, and enjoy Brazilian barbecue and tropical festivals.

name: Reykjavik
summary: The northernmost capital, famous for northern lights, glaciers, and geothermal spas like the Blue Lagoon. Try Icelandic lamb soup and explore stunning natural wonders.
